AUTHOR: Redjumpman
INSTALL_MSG:
This cog requires tabulate to work.
Please type pip3 install tabulate into cmd prompt to install the library.
PM me at Redjumpman#2375 if you have issues.
NAME: Dicetable
SHORT: Can roll multiple die and outputs to a table
DESCRIPTION: Ouputs each roll number, result, modifier, and total in a table.
